title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, interest fostering open welcoming community, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include: use sexualized language imagery Personal attacks Trolling insulting/derogatory comments Public private harassment Publishing ’s private information, physical electronic addresses, without explicit permission unethical unprofessional conduct Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, ban temporarily permanently contributor behaviors deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. adopting Code Conduct, project maintainers commit fairly consistently applying principles every aspect managing project. Project maintainers follow enforce Code Conduct may permanently removed project team. Code Conduct applies within project spaces public spaces individual representing project community. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported contacting project maintainer Angeline.Tillmanns@gov.bc.ca. complaints reviewed investigated result response deemed necessary appropriate circumstances. Maintainers obligated maintain confidentiality regard reporter incident. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 1.3.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/3/0/ project created using bcgovr package.

what: Updating Reference Data for the Database
title: Developer Instructions
text: Ecotox database updated quarterly US EPA. Updating database within wqbench involves several steps including downloading new database, reviewing updating reference files package, updating redeploying shiny app. process outlines steps necessary update wqbench package. instructions update redeploy shinyapp can found .

previous_headings: Updating Reference Data for the Database
title: Developer Instructions
text: Download (clone pull) wqbench repo open RStudio. best practice open new git branch, called something like update-[date--new-ecotox]. Rstudio, git pane -> New branch -> give name, check “Sync branch remote”. Ensure recent copy database reference files added. , load package, run function wqb_create_data_set(): Execute code script scripts/review-reference-datasets-01.R. script generate save set csv files need reviewed updated allow new values data cleaning steps. top script need set file path database location save files generated. defeault save : "~/Poisson/Data/wqbench/[current-year]/review/--reviewed/" files generated, need reviewed updated technical expert. next step must wait review complete. life stage code file can’t reviewed trophic groups updated. files reviewed placed : "~/Poisson/Data/wqbench/[current-year]/review/completed/" run scripts/update-reference-datasets-01.R script. Run line line - shown several displays showing updates made internal data - ensure look ok. , continue executing script, need revisit review changes made csv files completed folder. read reviewed files update reference files inst/extdata folder. package needs re-built files part package. Run devtools::load_all(). Run wqb_create_data_set() function create database new reference data. review/update life stage codes, repeat steps 2 6 run scripts/review-reference-datasets-02.R, review file, run scripts/update-reference-datasets-02.R.trophic groups need updated life stage codes can reviewed. Run wqb_create_data_set() function create database new reference data. steps caused changes several files inst/extdata. changes shown Git pane RStudio. Commit files Git, push GitHub. Go GitHub repository, open pull request branch (created step 1). Best practice someone review PR, know changes good, can merge . least, ensure automated checks pass merge. 9a. rare cases, “Add Data” templates may also need updated reference files updated. See “Update Add Data Templates article instructions. update merged, install new version: devtools::install_github("bcgov/wqbench").

previous_headings: Updating Reference Data for the Database
title: Developer Instructions
text: instructions fill complete reference files.

previous_headings: Updating Reference Data for the Database > Reference File Review Process
title: Developer Instructions
text: data set reviewed time new version database downloaded. value conc_conversion_flag column indicates new concentration unit previous version database. units converted mg/L ppm put 0 row. additional columns need filled unit given value 0 conc_conversion_flag column. conc_conversion_value_multiplier column fill value needed convert units mg/L ppm. conc_conversion_unit column fill either mg/L ppm. completed, file saved "completed" subfolder review folder. incorrect conversions found, rows can updated.

previous_headings: Updating Reference Data for the Database > Reference File Review Process
title: Developer Instructions
text: data set reviewed time new version database downloaded. value duration_units_to_keep column indicates new concentration unit previous version database. units converted hours, put 0 row. additional columns need filled unit given value 0 duration_units_to_keep column. duration_value_multiplier_to_hours column fill value needed convert units hours. comments column write conversion chosen since may assumption made conversion. example, converting month hours basing conversion 30 31 days. completed, file saved "completed" subfolder review folder. incorrect conversions found, rows can updated.

previous_headings: Updating Reference Data for the Database > Reference File Review Process
title: Developer Instructions
text: data set reviewed time new version database downloaded. summary shows unique phylum, class, order, family new taxa new version Ecotox database, meet exclusion criteria. words, candidate taxa added internal dataset. taxon appropriate inclusion, put 1 exclude_from_db column. Otherwise leave blank. appropriate include, fill trophic_group ecological_group columns. Valid values trophic_group : “Invertebrate”, “Algae”, “Amphibian”, “Plant”, “Bacteria”, “Fish”. Valid values ecological_group : “Planktonic Invertebrate”, “”, “Salmonid”. row “missing-trophic-review” sheet doesn’t family order, one two things: phylum/division really small /whole taxon can assigned ecological group trophic group, . (e.g. Annelida, Arthropoda), put 1 exclude_from_db column phylum/division won’t appear review , lower levels within phylum/division . completed, file saved "completed" subfolder review folder. list species data database filtered organism_habitat “Water”. file reference updated sent back integration.

previous_headings: Updating Reference Data for the Database > Reference File Review Process
title: Developer Instructions
text: data set reviewed time new version database downloaded. data set sent separately first round files reviewed data depends updates trophic group data. fish amphibian groups need life stage categorized simple groups, file contains fish amphibians. lifestage-code-review.csv: - value simple_lifestage column indicates new life stage previous coding database. - goal review ensure cells simple_lifestage filled . - simple_lifestage column fill empty cells either els (early life stage), juvenile adult. completed, file saved "completed" subfolder review folder.

previous_headings: Updating Reference Data for the Database > Reference File Review Process
title: Developer Instructions
text: reference dataset included review-reference-datasets.R script vary year year. data set comprehensive list generated B.C. Conservation Data Centre. species ECOTOX, listed bc-species.csv reference file treated present BC.

previous_headings: Updating Reference Data for the Database > Reference File Review Process
title: Developer Instructions
text: reference dataset included review-reference-datasets.R script vary year year. comprehensive list need adjusted. list concentration endpoints generated scripts/concentration-endpoints.R script. updates required update concentration-endpoints.R script.

title: Update the Add Data Templates
text: rarely need done additions / removals ecological groups trophic groups uncommon

previous_headings: Updating the Add Data Template
title: Update the Add Data Templates
text: instructions upload data template need updated changes reference data sheets occur. following files updated according Developer Instructions, changes may trigger necessary updates Add Data templates instrutions: ie Plant removed trophic group Salmonid removed ecological group. Since groups (Plant, Bacteria, Amphibian, etc) written instruction tab updates instructions needed new categories added. validation values done trophic-groups.csv means possible instructions get sync allowed values. Adding new species trophic-groups.csv trigger change instructions. ie els removed simple life stage. validation done lifestage-codes.csv means possible instructions get sync allowed values. Update endpoint column instructions endpoints added removed. list endpoints generated script scripts/concentration-endpoints.R. validation done concentration-endpoints.csv possible instructions get sync allowed values.

previous_headings: Updating the Add Data Template
title: Update the Add Data Templates
text: Make required changes trophic groups, life stage codes concentration endpoints reference data. edit file inst/template/template-data.xlsx. regenerate template run script data-raw/template.R. edit file inst/template/template-data.xlsx.

title: Update the Add Data Templates
text: Finally, updates completed, push GitHub. Install updated package devtools::install_github("bcgov/wqbench").

title: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks
text: package contains functions tools generate aquatic life water quality benchmarks.

previous_headings: Workflow
what: Create Data Set for Shiny App
title: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks
text: wqb_create_data_set() function download US EPA ECOTOX1 database, create local .sqlite database, add data sources filter conditions, clean process data, classify duration, standardize effect output completed data set needed shinywqbench app. function create RDS file data set well. takes minutes download create data set. default argument : file_path save raw text files "~/Ecotoxicology/ecotox". folder_path save .sqlite database RDS file "~/Ecotoxicology/ecotox_db/". version download recent version data set available website. data set can read created.

previous_headings: Workflow
title: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks

previous_headings: Workflow > Generate Benchmark
title: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks
text: calculate benchmark chemical, divide critical toxicity value (ctv) assessment factors. Deterministic method generates estimate, lcl ucl columns always blank .
code: data <- wqb_filter_chemical(wqbenchdata::aquatic_data, "100016") data <- wqb_benchmark_method(data)  data_agg <- wqb_aggregate(data) data_agg <- wqb_af(data_agg)  ctv <- wqb_generate_ctv(data_agg) ctv ## # A tibble: 1 × 3 ##   ctv_est_mg.L ctv_lcl_mg.L ctv_ucl_mg.L ##          <dbl>        <dbl>        <dbl> ## 1          2.5           NA           NA benchmark <- ctv / (data_agg$af_bc_species * data_agg$af_salmon * data_agg$af_planktonic * data_agg$af_variation) benchmark ##   ctv_est_mg.L ctv_lcl_mg.L ctv_ucl_mg.L ## 1   0.04166667           NA           NA # Plot data set wqb_plot(data) # Plot the results wqb_plot_det(data_agg)

previous_headings: Workflow > Generate Benchmark
title: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks
text: calculate benchmark chemical, divide critical toxicity value (ctv) assessment factors. SSD method can generate lower upper confidence interval.
code: data <- wqb_filter_chemical(wqbenchdata::aquatic_data, "1071836") data <- wqb_benchmark_method(data)  data_agg <- wqb_aggregate(data) data_agg <- wqb_af(data_agg)  ctv <- wqb_generate_ctv(data_agg) ctv ## # A tibble: 1 × 3 ##   ctv_est_mg.L ctv_lcl_mg.L ctv_ucl_mg.L ##          <dbl>        <dbl>        <dbl> ## 1      0.00981      0.00105       0.0543 benchmark <- ctv / (data_agg$af_bc_species * data_agg$af_salmon * data_agg$af_planktonic * data_agg$af_variation) benchmark ##   ctv_est_mg.L ctv_lcl_mg.L ctv_ucl_mg.L ## 1  0.009808029  0.001050889   0.05426475 # Plot data set wqb_plot(data) # Plot the results fit <- wqb_ssd_fit(data_agg) wqb_plot_ssd(data_agg, fit)

previous_headings: Workflow > Generate Benchmark
title: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks
code: wqb_summary_trophic_species(data_agg) ## # A tibble: 5 × 2 ##   `Trophic Group` `Number of Species` ##   <fct>                         <int> ## 1 Algae                             6 ## 2 Amphibian                         4 ## 3 Fish                             11 ## 4 Invertebrate                     12 ## 5 Plant                             8 wqb_summary_trophic_groups(data_agg) ## # A tibble: 4 × 2 ##   Consideration           Result                                                 ##   <chr>                   <chr>                                                  ## 1 Trophic group(s)        Algae, Amphibian, Fish, Invertebrate, Plant            ## 2 Salmonid(s)             Oncorhynchus kisutch, Oncorhynchus mykiss, Oncorhynch… ## 3 Planktonic Invertebrate Artemia franciscana                                    ## 4 B.C. species            Cyprinus carpio, Lemna minor, Myriophyllum aquaticum,… wqb_summary_af(data_agg) ## # A tibble: 3 × 3 ##   Consideration                `Assessment Factor` Description                   ##   <chr>                                      <int> <chr>                         ## 1 Species variation factor                       1 Accounts for uncertainty due… ## 2 Ecological assessment factor                   1 Accounts for uncertainty whe… ## 3 B.C. species                                   1 Accounts for uncertainty of …

text: data.frame columns: name Row description. latin_name latin name test species. endpoint Toxicity endpoint. effect effect tested. lifestage lifestage species test. effect_conc_mg.L Contaminant concentration corresponds endpoint. effect_conc_std_mg.L effect concentration standardized include acute chronic ratio extrapolate acute /effect concentrations chronic /-effect concentrations mg/L. trophic_group Trophic group species. ecological_group Identification salmonids planktonic invertebrates. neither , listed “”. species_present_in_bc Species present British Columbia entry = TRUE

title: Add BC Species — wqb_add_bc_species
text: BC species data contained csv file extdata folder package. file can edited adding new species removing species. add new columns, rename columns rename file. file must contain single column named latin_name. latin_name column must consist genus species separated space. latin_name column bc-species.csv file matched latin_name column species table database. new column species_present_in_bc added species table codes species TRUE matches value bc-species.csv FALSE match.

title: Download ECOTOX Data Files — wqb_download_epa_ecotox
text: US EPA ECOTOX website: https://cfpub.epa.gov/ecotox/ Olker, J. H., Elonen, C. M., Pilli, ., Anderson, ., Kinziger, B., Erickson, S., Skopinski, M., Pomplun, ., LaLone, C. ., Russom, C. L., & Hoff, D. (2022). ECOTOXicology Knowledgebase: Curated Database Ecologically Relevant Toxicity Tests Support Environmental Research Risk Assessment. Environmental Toxicology Chemistry, 41(6):1520-1539. https://doi.org/10.1002/etc.5324

what: wqbench: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks — wqbench-package
title: wqbench: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks — wqbench-package
text: Download recent versions US EPA ECOTOX database. Clean, standardize classify data values comparable. Use SSD deterministic method determine critical toxicity value assessment factors compute aquatic life water quality benchmark compound.

title: wqbench: Calculate Aquatic Life Benchmarks — wqbench-package
text: Maintainer: Angeline Tillmanns Angeline.Tillmanns@gov.bc.ca Authors: Ayla Pearson ayla@poissonconsulting.ca (ORCID) contributors: Joe Thorley joe@poissonconsulting.ca (ORCID) [contributor] Andy Teucher andy@andyteucher.ca (ORCID) [contributor] Province British Columbia [copyright holder]

title: wqbench 0.3.1
text: Fixed bug wqb_check_add_data() allowing “Planktonic Invertebrates” ecological group.

title: wqbench 0.3.0
text: fixed read_bcg() work updated data BC Data Catalogue (#46) Updated Ecotox version 09-12-2024 internal reference files (#49) Updated BC Species list (#50) Separate package update instructions app update instructions Enhanced update instructions Trophic group review: started list taxa include based ecotox group, exclude based reviews. means reviews won’t overwhelmed huge lists taxonomic groups relevant. Made reading large csvs robust explicitly adding column types Updated minimum ssdtools package version

title: wqbench 0.2.0
text: Added template adding data pulled data set. Updated default number bootstrap samples 1,000. Updated pull BC wqg data bcdata package. Updated data structure account ECOTOX version 09-14-2023 data structure. Minimum version R required now 4.1. Updated internal reference data sets ECOTOX version 12-14-2023. Trophic groups reference data now includes phylum division family. Filtered "Moss, Hornworts", "Miscellaneous", "Fungi", "Reptiles" ecotox_group column species table. Added developer instructions updating reference data sets tasks. ssdtools set use (>= 1.0.6.9011) use stable distributions.
